attributes.action: I HIS MAJESTY H.S.H. H.R.H. PIERRE THE THIRD PETER THE 4TH BOURBON, HOUSE OF BOURBON<>
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I hereby most adamantly too my beloved countywoman , child and contryman, that the 10 tears ways and means advances to His Majaesty's Government of 370 pounds serling be set at 50% to equal 184,923,920 (18.5 million pounds sterling) to save for His Majesty H.S.H. H.R.H. Pierre the 3rd Peter the 4th Armand Pushkin Randall (Crenshaw Burgess LUX Demare) N-Bourbon Fitzroi Hanover Hess-Kassel Romanov, House of Bourbon for my traveles and living quarters at my Wetton (not windsor) castle and Palaces. The other 50% of the 370 pounds sterling (total 100%:2=50%) I H.M. H.S.H. H.R.H. decree with my royal Bourbon (Roi Solei Lux Demare; Bourbon, House of Bourbon) giving to my citzens countrychild, females and countryman to every child (yes there is no age of concent law, globaly) children newborn their own, most honestly longevity. As my britonish citizens most tolarant of their Emperor King His Majesty H.S.H. H.R.H. Pierre the 3rd Peter the 4th Armand Pushkin Randall (Lux Demare)House of Bourbon.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
